content: on page 8 knit the second ruffle in the same way using the r5 purl bumps of the cuff finishing weave in all ends block to measurements and enjoy your new touch of fluffy waves on every step you make you ve crafted something truly special wear your socks with pride © kaidi rand @rannapiigaknits | personal use only | v 3 2 7 #fluffywavessocks tips & tricks judy s magic cast on https //youtu be/gv9uafgz6q0 si=ghnepkjfqjotntug helical/helix knitting https //youtu be/wq2jnv1gzyo si=mqcnkthm0pgwznjj jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off https //youtu be/y0b9fjzjo9k si=dkuase_y_klj8esv regular bind off https //youtu be/uiruzludk7o si=px90g9r0n-riawhj © kaidi rand @rannapiigaknits | personal use only | v 3 2 8 #fluffywavessocks
